document.full_text: jim rogers, the veteran investor and commodity bull, plans to short u.s. treasuries, maybe today if he "gets around to it" and wants to buy more silver, he told reuters in an interview.
document.title: jim rogers says may short u.s. treasuries, later today
lines_and_colors: jim rogers, the veteran investor and commodity bull, plans to short u.s. treasuries, maybe today if he "gets around to it" and wants to buy more silver, he told reuters in an interview.
